fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, you may select NUMBER (you CAN self target) to protect. You will ABILITY.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You'll also deal aATTACK attack to aVISITOR.
- If your target is attacked, you will BONUS.
